Package org.specs.comp.ollir

Class Method

java.lang.Object
org.specs.comp.ollir.Method
public class Method extends Object
Class represents each method in the input OLLIR class.

    • checkLabels

      public void checkLabels() throws OllirErrorException
      Check if the labels used in the branch and goto instructions are associated with an instruction of the method. If not, exit from the ollir processor.
      Throws:
      OllirErrorException - exception if the label used is a goto and a conditional branch does not exist.

    • addToVartable

      public int addToVartable(Instruction inst, int varID)
      This method adds to the symbol table of variables the vars used in each instruction and their associated descriptors. This can be improved by moving to each instruction class the method to create and add the descriptor.
      Parameters:
      inst - an object representing an OLLIR instruction
      varID - the id of virtual registers/variables

    • buildVarTable

      public void buildVarTable()
      Builds a symbol table for the varaiables of the method: paramenters and local variables. It assigns a varID that can be considered the ID of virtual registers or JVM local variables if targeting the JVM. The parameters use varID from 0 (if the method is static) or 1 (if the mathod is not static) to the number of parameters of the method (or -1 when teh varID starts with 0). The local variables use subsequent values for varID. The table uses a key which is the name of the variable and associates it with a Descriptor (see class Descriptor).

    • buildCFG

      public void buildCFG()
      Builds the control-flow graph (CFG) of the method. It uses the ArrayList listOfInstr of instructions and assumes that the instructions are in that ArrayList by the order they order in the input OLLIR.

    • outputCFG

      public void outputCFG() throws OllirErrorException
      This method generates a textual dotty file .dot representing the CFG of the OLLIR code of the method. The dotty file generated uses the name of the method. The https://graphviz.org/ Webpage interface: https://dreampuf.github.io/GraphvizOnline/
      Throws:
      OllirErrorException - an Exception in case of error

    • show

      public void show()
      Print the information regarding a method.
